  • Method Details

    • compareImages

      public double compareImages​(java.lang.String basePath, java.lang.String targetPath, double comparisonThreshold)
      Overloaded compareImages(BufferedImage, BufferedImage, double) method loads images from passed file paths and then calls former overloaded comparison method.
      Parameters:
      basePath - Expected image's path.
      targetPath - Actual image's path.
      comparisonThreshold - Minimum comparison score to assert that images matched.
      Returns:
      Comparison score, if images matched.

    • compareImages

      public double compareImages​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage baseImage, java.awt.image.BufferedImage targetImage, double comparisonThreshold)
      Method compares images and returns their comparison score, if images matched, if images do not match throws ImagesDoNotMatchException exception. In case of image dimension difference resizes images and then compares.

      At the time of writing test framework has single implementation of comparator using Sikuli. When comparing resized images of different resolutions, the comparison score drops. Target image resolution cannot be too different from base image. As an example in current SUT test suite, comparison between product thumbnail image and stored full size product image is unreliable.

      Parameters:
      baseImage - Expected image.
      targetImage - Actual image.
      comparisonThreshold - Minimum comparison score to assert that images matched.
      Returns:
      Comparison score, if images matched.

    • compareImagesHelper

      protected abstract double compareImagesHelper​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage baseImage, java.awt.image.BufferedImage targetImage, double comparisonThreshold)
      Abstract method to get comparison score in compareImages(String, String, double) method. Implementations should throw ImagesDoNotMatchException exception when comparison score is less than comparison threshold.
      Parameters:
      baseImage - Expected image.
      targetImage - Actual image.
      comparisonThreshold - Minimum comparison score to assert that images matched.
      Returns:
      Comparison score, if images matched.
